name: Piz A Way
description:
Piz  A Way is a first person shooting. Your goal is to save the pizza befor burn it away.

there are multiple-ending .

 you can shoot your way through or find shortcuts for cut through obstacles.

how to play

W A S D = movement

Spacebar = Jump

Ctrl = crouch

Left click = Shoot

Q &  E = use special gadgats
